channel.title: "Tactical Mafia Kills"
channel.description:
Step 1: allow all Roses to decide to "take the kill" rather than their normal night abilities via a button. This means they will not use normal abilities, and instead visit the target and kill them.
Step 2: Rework Assassin (Maybe Scorpion too.)
Step 3: Profit
